statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the trapezoid above. Side lengths are measurements.
The bottom has length \displaystyle{14.28}; top has length \displaystyle{10.52}. The sides have lengths \displaystyle{7.66} and \displaystyle{7.64}. The height is \displaystyle{7.42}.

solution.p: The perimeter is the sum of the four sides which are given. \displaystyle{10.52}+{7.64}+{14.28}+{7.66}={40.1}.
